snippet.title: Shattered State | Launch Video | Daydream
snippet.description:
Watch the Shattered State trailer – A cinematic VR thriller for Daydream. Assume the role of the Director of the NIA in the midst of a national crisis. Who will you save? Who will you trust? – Only your decisions can prevent catastrophe!

Buy it now - http://po.st/Shattered_State
